sentences.en: A daily one-hour news show can cost $250,000 to produce.
sentences.cn: 时长为一小时的日播新闻节目的制作费用可能会高达25万美元。

sentences.en: a factory that produces microchips
sentences.cn: 微芯片制造厂

sentences.en: a rise in sea level produced by climatic change
sentences.cn: 由气候变化引起的海平面升高

sentences.en: An adult cat may produce kittens three times a year.
sentences.cn: 一只成年猫一年可以生三次小猫。

sentences.en: As a policy, it did not produce the desired effect .
sentences.cn: 作为一项政策，它并未产生预期的效果。

sentences.en: As a policy, it did not produce the desired effect.
sentences.cn: 作为一项政策，它并未产生预期的效果。

sentences.en: As little as 50mg of caffeine can produce pharmacological effects.
sentences.cn: 仅仅50毫克的咖啡因就能产生药理效果。

sentences.en: fresh local produce
sentences.cn: 新鲜的本地农产品

sentences.en: He produced a letter from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里掏出一封信来。

sentences.en: He relied on translucent enamels to produce vivid, glowing pictures.
sentences.cn: 他利用半透明瓷漆绘制出鲜艳生动的图画。

sentences.en: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentences.cn: 它的发电成本要比核电站低。

sentences.en: New drugs are producing remarkable results .
sentences.cn: 新药正在产生显著的效果。

sentences.en: New drugs are producing remarkable results.
sentences.cn: 新药正在产生显著的效果。

sentences.en: Of course, not all alcoholics and drug abusers produce deviant offspring.
sentences.cn: 当然，并不是所有的酗酒者和吸毒者都会生育出不正常的后代。

sentences.en: Some sedatives produce the para-doxical effect of making the person more anxious.
sentences.cn: 一些镇静剂适得其反，加重了患者的焦虑。

sentences.en: Spending could outrun the capacity of businesses to produce the goods.
sentences.cn: 消费有可能超出企业的产能。

sentences.en: The factory produces an incredible 100 cars per hour.
sentences.cn: 那家工厂一小时生产100辆汽车，令人难以置信。

sentences.en: The flakes seem to fuse together and produce ice crystals.
sentences.cn: 雪花好像融合在一起形成了冰晶。

sentences.en: The formalization of co-operation between the republics would produce progress.
sentences.cn: 正式确立合作关系将会促进共和国之间合作的顺利进展。

sentences.en: The management tries to produce the magazine as cost-effectively as possible.
sentences.cn: 管理层试图尽可能地让杂志盈利。

sentences.en: The orchestra contrived to produce some of its best playing for years.
sentences.cn: 这支管弦乐队呈现了精彩的演奏，堪称其多年来的巅峰演奏。

sentences.en: Their aim will be to produce as much milk as possible.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标是尽可能提高牛奶产量。

sentences.en: These plants are then pollinated and allowed to mature and produce seed.
sentences.cn: 然后，这些植物就被授粉，从而成熟结籽。

sentences.en: This region produces the grapes used in champagne.
sentences.cn: 该地区出产酿造香槟酒用的葡萄。

sentences.en: Town gardens are ideal because they produce flowers nearly all year round.
sentences.cn: 城市公园是理想去处，那里几乎一年四季鲜花盛开。

sentences.en: We manage to get most of our produce in Britain.
sentences.cn: 我们设法在英国搞到我们所需的大部分农产品。

sentences.en: We manage to get most of our produce in farmers' markets.
sentences.cn: 我们设法在农贸市场弄到大部分我们需要的农产品。

words.tran_cn: 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的
制作人，制片人；生产者；发生器
赢利性；生产率，生产能力；多产性
生产力；生产率；生产能力
产生；制造（produce的过去式和过去分词）；创作

trans.tran_en: food or other things that have been grown or produced on a farm to be sold

trans.tran_cn: 引起，生产，生长，造出，出示，栽培，制作（电影等）
trans.tran_en: to cause a particular result or effect

trans.tran_cn: 生产， 制造， 产生； 引起， 招致； 上演， 上映
trans.tran_en: to cause a particular result or effect
